name: Remove Account From Domain Admin Group
description: This test will remove an account from the domain admins group

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Requires the Active Directory module for powershell to be installed.

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Requires the Active Directory module for powershell to be installed.

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Requires the Active Directory module for powershell to be installed.

input_arguments.name: super_user
input_arguments.description: Account used to run the execution command (must include domain).

input_arguments.name: remove_user
input_arguments.description: Account to remove from domain admins.
